page.title: 12THE RIVER SOWE
page.content: The River Sowe flows from the North of Coventry around the Eastern side and then flows South through Warwickshire down to Stoneleigh. It is a lovely sight to see in some parts but in others pollution and destruction occur with the oil spilled pools,with rubbish and crisp papers drifting downstream to nicer parts,destroying beauty.Oil traces leave a trail of pollution and death to animals which have survived a long time.But people do not care,they murder not one or two but thousands every year. Also looking at the pleasanter side of the river,the odd thrush or kingfisher,robin or blackbird can be seen.The predator waits for its prey peacefully swimming by,then splash another death.That is Nature,pollution is not.
